Title: The Host
Writer: Bong Joon Ho (screenplay), Won-jun Ha (screenplay), Chul-hyun Baek (screenplay)
Actors: Kang-ho Song, Byun Hee-Bong, Park Hae-il, Bae Doona
Plot: A monster emerges from Seoul's Han River and begins attacking people. One victim's loving family does what it can to rescue her from its clutches.
Production: Chockstone Pictures, Silver Reel, Nick Wechsler
